title: Levels 18/30: Alternatives
content: - Wait and use the Circus weekly D&D whenever available (train other skills or progress in other areas while you wait) - Repeatedly climb the trellis shortcut on the north-eastern corner of the Watchtower in Yanille - 10k xp/h - Burthorpe Agility Course , Gnome Stronghold Agility Course , or repeatedly jumping the Nature Grotto bridge - 7.5k xp/hr - Catching and releasing Toy Mouse - 9k–13k xp/hr

title: Levels 30–52: Intermediate Courses
content: - Players will take damage if they fail obstacles, but will still progress and gain experience. - Each obstacle players cross has a chance of dropping 1-4 codex pages , and materials for the base camp. - The entire island is sometimes subject to a powerful roar which will give players an extra 25% experience, and increase the drop rate of codex pages and other rewards. - Players can also build the Anachronia base camp Spa for a persistent 5, 7, or 10% bonus to agility experience from the course.

title: Levels 52/65+: Wilderness Course with Demonic Skull
content: - Wilderness Agility Course with Demonic skull before 65 – 70k xp/h (pre 65)
The experience per hour listed below is based on a lap time of 44 seconds with no failures.

title: Levels 65–80: Empty Throne Room
content: - Manual Auto-cycle in The Empty Throne Room – 24.8k xp/h full AFK

title: Levels 77–99: Prifddinas Activities
content: - Hefin Agility Course – 58k–109k xp/hr depending on familiarity
